revised_title: K-Partitions of R-Gon and R-Ace: Theoretical Investigations and Properties
tldr: The author investigates the K-partitions of the R-gon and R-ace, focusing on their reversible and irreversible configurations, axes of reversion, and properties. The study includes the enumeration of partitions, the identification of axial configurations, and the analysis of various theorems related to the symmetry and structure of the polygons.
